The following is a valid way of cracking it:

1. Download this keygen ripped from a previous torrent on here (the 32bit only 10.0 HD series)
[If you don't trust my link, it cant be found in several torrents on here]
2. Install Vegas normally. (be sure to quit all processes of vegas before patching or it will error!)
3. Open key gen and hit patch (bottom left) --> select the directory you install sony vegas to (on 64bit version, the Shared-Plugins directory will be in the Programs x86 folder under 'Sony)
4. Use the  key for Sony Vegas HD 10.0 32bit + 64bit series to install and activate as mentioned on here.

9. Now you can switch on the internet

is this version updatable

For all of you having that Authentication problem:

"5. Now start up Sony Vegas Pro 10 and you should be prompted with an activation window asking, click next and it will ask for your serial now run the keygen, might need to be ran as administrator, click the drop down box and select VEGAS PRO 8.0 SERIES, (Yeah it works). Click generate a few times if you prefer, now copy and paste the serial number into the serial window in Vegas 10, now this is important, change the 1FW in the beginning of the serial to 1R8 like this - 1R8-KBK1-FP44-9HH5, now click next, it should ask how you want to register, register from another computer, fill out the bolded fields with lulzy information, accept the policy save it to where you don't care. Now it should be asking for an authorization key, with your the Keygen still up right click the authentication code box and select all, then right click and copy and paste it into the vegas 10 activation box, then click next. If everything went correctly you should have your details under the licensed splash screen."

oh, just fixed it

since this program requires other programs to work, and in case we don't have the program there's no problem because it's included on the vegas installation, this is what I did:

I had to remove all of the .NET framework and Microsoft C++ 2005/2008 (etc) (included the one installed from vegas pro 10)

had to uninstall the vegas pro 10 and delete the sony folders on C:/program files/sony

afterwards, I installed .NET framework and microsoft C++ from vegas pro 8 (had to download it and install it) and then finally installed vegas pro 10 following the read me rules and it worked like normal... 

I guess there was something wrong with the .NET framework and microsoft C++ I had previously...

Works Perfectly fine!

For does who doesn't work READ THIS!
Download the Torrent
In the folder there should be rar files
Extract the top one, into a folder, then all of them should be extract if you only do the top one, when done, run 64bit or the 32bit, and look at the read.me file, and right click open with > Notepad and should show instruction for crack. Enjoy!

STEPS FOR PERFECT INSTALLATION
(I'm using Windows 7 64-Bit.)
1. Download the torrent.
2. Create a folder on your desktop (Name it anything you want, I went with Vegas 10.)
3. Add everything from the download folder to the one on your desktop.
4. Open the FIRST .rar file you see.
5. Run either vegaspro100c_32bit (Yes, I know, but like it says in one of the readme files, the 64-bit is a little worse.)
6. Run whichever file you pick (32 or 64-bit) as administrator (If you want, I didn't. It worked fine for me.)
7. When it prompts you to download and install a new version, do it.
8. After everything is done, disconnect your internet.
9. Open up the first .rar file again (If you closed it.)
10. Drag the two files "SonyVegasProCRACK.exe" and "Keygen.exe" into the desktop folder.
11. Run SonyVegasProCRACK.exe AS ADMINISTRATOR. (If you get a "virus" warning, tell your AV to fuck off. Keygens and patchers are usually false positives, anyway.)
12. Click on the Director Clapper and find your Sony Vegas root file. (Most likely C:\Program Files (x86)\Sony\Vegas Pro 10.0.)
13. Now click the button DIRECTLY TO THE LEFT OF THE CLAPPER.
14. Click on "Crack Me" under the faceless girl's head.
15. Give it a minute, and let it finish.
16. Once it's done, click on the "LAZAR" face on top of the X. Also right next to the Plus sign thing, on the right.
17. Run "Keygen.exe" AS ADMINISTRATOR. (Remember, right click?)
18. Under "Product Name:" Click Vegas Pro 8.0 Series.
19. Click generate a few times, try to find a serial that you like.
20. (OPTIONAL) Open notepad, paste in the serial. Change the first 3 characters to 1R8.
21. Open up Vegas Pro 10. (Finally, right?)
22. Click register or whatever. (I forget. Just don't pick start trial.)
23. Enter serial. (Hopefully you did 20. If not, change the first 3 characters to 1R8.
23. Click "Register from another computer"
25. Enter your name, anyones name(doesn't matter) along with an e-mail.
26. Save the .html doc as DELETE THIS.
27. Enter the Activation Code from the Keygen into Vegas.
28. Vegas should open, displaying the name and serial you registered with.
29. Have fun, and if I left anything out, tell me.

Sorry.

30. Delete the DELETE THIS file. (Remember, that .html one, which your supposed to "Register from another computer"?)

6. Run Vegas Pro-->Next-->Copy Serial Number from keygen( DO NOT CLOSE THE KEYGEN!)
7.Next-->Select activate from another computer, and save that file anywhere.
8.Copy paste the Authentication Code from the keygen and then next/finish.
